message: Hi Bob, I'm looking to sell this great product. I think it would really benefit you. I'm asking for $180 to start. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for offering me the product. I believe it has value, but I am only willing to pay up to $150. Looking forward to your response.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I see you recognize the value in this product. How about we meet in the middle at $165?
Hi Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I'm still hoping to keep the price closer to my budget. Would $155 be within your consideration?
